value:
The manaketes' power has waned.
Morva has been subdued. All that
remains is to shatter the stones...

Humans are demons' preferred prey.
They are so wonderfully vulnerable
to their own grief and resentment...

Does this form frighten you? Ha. I can
take on another, if you so wish.

It is inconvenient to move about the
castle in this form. Perhaps I should
borrow the body of an Askran noble...

You still refuse to surrender, fragile
prince? Even after your body and
mind belong to me?

Hmm... Which is a more fitting vessel
for me to possess? Shall I take you...
or $Nf?

I will taint this pathetic land, corrupt
these foolish humans, and reign
for eternity as the Demon King!

Wither and rot under my destructive
power! Face your demise if you dare!
Approach the gates of my domain!

If your mood is influenced by these
pointless fluctuations, then you are
a miserably shallow fool.

A sensible one, you are. I shall
remember your name.

Lament, weep, despair! Wail, scream,
tremble! The Demon King is risen!

What is it you seek from the Demon
King, $Nu?$k$pEternal life? The resurrection of one
you have lost? I am the master of
death. Nothing is beyond me!$k$pOf course, the corruption of life and
death is evil. But why should we not
seize the power of evil for ourselves?$k$pEvil can never be destroyed. The
Fire Emblem and the Sacred Stones
can never vanquish it.$k$pLet us grasp true darkness, you and I.
Let us rise up, corrupt the land, and
rule over all of these maggots!
Lament your fate.
Weep for the dead.
Despair for the living.
Wail and tremble in grief.
I will persist.
I am Fomortiis. I am returned.
You dare lay a hand upon me?
It was I who planted the seed from which Lyon's ambitions grew.
My deceit made Lyon my puppet, and oh, how he danced at the end of my strings.
Grado's disaster cannot be averted.
Do you still intend to oppose me, fragile prince?
Do not think yourself capable of containing me.
If I must.
Hmm...
Grovel in awe.
